testcase.name: user selects the most expensive item and checkout succesfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user login with the username and password "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".passed When user selects the highest priced item on the inventory page.............passed When user clicks on the basket icon to go to the basket page................passed Then user is able to be on the basket page..................................passed And user able to see product has been added to cart.........................passed When user clicks on the check out button....................................passed Then user is able to be on the checkout page................................passed When user enters the firstname as "burak" , lastname as "aslim", and postalcode as "123456".passed Then user is able to see the firstname as "burak" , lastname as "aslim", and postalcode as "123456".passed When user clicks on continue button.........................................passed Then user is able to be on the overview page................................passed And user is able to see prices of the items.................................passed When user clicks on finish button...........................................passed Then user is able to see the "Thank you for your order!" message............passed

testcase.name: user checks the selected items' names and prices are same in the cart page
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user login with the username and password "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".passed When user selects items on the inventory page...............................passed When user clicks on the basket icon to go to the basket page................passed Then user is able to see items' names and totals are equal on the cart......passed

testcase.name: User going to the main page by using the page url
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed Given user login with the username and password "standard_user" and "secret_password".passed Given assertion for unsuccesful login.......................................passed
